query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS businessFrameworks (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  category VARCHAR(100),
  framework TEXT NOT NULL,
  steps TEXT,
  benefits TEXT,
  tierRequired ENUM('free', 'starter', 'lite', 'pro', 'elite') DEFAULT 'free' NOT NULL,
  estimatedTimeSavings VARCHAR(100),
  difficulty ENUM('beginner', 'intermediate', 'advanced') DEFAULT 'beginner',
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS caseStudies (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  businessType VARCHAR(200),
  challenge TEXT,
  solution TEXT NOT NULL,
  results TEXT NOT NULL,
  timeSaved VARCHAR(100),
  costSaved VARCHAR(100),
  roiPercentage INT,
  industry VARCHAR(100),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  tierRequired ENUM('free', 'starter', 'lite', 'pro', 'elite') DEFAULT 'free' NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS implementationGuides (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  category VARCHAR(100),
  steps TEXT NOT NULL,
  tools TEXT,
  estimatedTime VARCHAR(100),
  difficulty ENUM('beginner', 'intermediate', 'advanced') DEFAULT 'beginner',
  prerequisites TEXT,
  expectedOutcome TEXT,
  tierRequired ENUM('free', 'starter', 'lite', 'pro', 'elite') DEFAULT 'free' NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
